name: Billionworlds: Kingdoms
description:
Lightweight turn based civilization type strategy game, with focus on co-up multiplayer!

  • Fantastic combination of simple hex based graphics and deep strategic gameplay
  • Single & multiplayer
  • Team based multiplayer enables epic battles with your friends against your friends!
  • 4x (eXplore, eXpand, eXploit, and eXterminate)
  • Gather resources, Expand your borders, Upgrade your cities with buildings, Explore the world (fog of war), Research Technology and Conquer the world.
  • Kingdoms with unique units and Kings with special abilities.
